    • buildWithLevelMethod

      private void buildWithLevelMethod​(BuildAction buildAction, Worker worker, Tile tile, int buildLevel) throws java.io.IOException

      Parameters:
      buildAction - action from the playerID's list of actions
      worker - name of the worker that build
      tile - tile where build
      buildLevel - new level of the building on the tile

      java.io.IOException - when socket closes
